mods.abstract: For over 40 years, Joe Nadicksbernd was a major part of Christian Brothers athletics, whether as a student athlete or a coach. From 1967-1971, he was a star player on the CBC baseball and basketball teams. He coached the basketball team from 1978-1982, which was followed by 25 years as baseball coach. He became Athletics Director in 2003, a position he held until his death in 2014.

For all requests, please contact the Archives at archives@cbu.edu.
